thread.section_title: ArchitecturalDepot.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ArchitecturalDepot.com | architecturaldepot.com
thread.title: Steve Holland

author: Steve Holland
title: Steve Holland
text: Achitectural Depot kept me informed of the status of my order through the entire process. They informed me when the order was entered, when it was scheduled to ship and when it actually shipped they provided the tracking number for it. In fact, it shipped a few days before the original scheduled shipping date. Everything needed for installation was included in the hardware packages.
